mapper.delete: delete from Block where blocking_id = #{blocking_id} and blocker_id = #{blocker_id}
mapper.insert: insert into Block (blocker_id, blocking_id, Block_date) values (#{blocker_id}, #{blocking_id}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from Block a where exists(select * from Block b where b.blocking_id = #{blocking_id} and b.blocker_id = #{blocker_id})
